sentences.en: A person submitting a request or application; a petitioner.
sentences.cn: 申请人，请求者提出请求或申请的人；请求人。

sentences.en: A The Petitioner had made or will make proper financial provision for the Respondent.
sentences.cn: 呈请人已经或将会为答辩人提供妥当的经济援助.

sentences.en: Both the petitioner and respondent provide for the upkeep of the children.
sentences.cn: 离婚上诉方和被告方共同抚养子女。

sentences.en: Enron forwarded a copy of that letter to petitioner.
sentences.cn: 安然转寄了一份该信函的复印件给上诉人.

sentences.en: If the petitioner dies or , if there are more than one petitioner , the last remaining petitioner dies.
sentences.cn: 如呈请人去世；或如有多于一名呈请人，最后尚存的呈请人去世；

sentences.en: Petitioner audited Enron � � s publicly filed financial statements and provided internal audit and consulting services to it.
sentences.cn: 上诉人审计安然公开申报的财政报告并为其提供内部审计和咨询服务.

sentences.en: The District Court denied petitioner � � s motion for a judgment of acquittal.
sentences.cn: 地区法院驳回上诉人提出的无罪判决的动议.

sentences.en: The name and contact information of the petitioner.
sentences.cn: 申请人的名称和联系信息.

sentences.en: The party appealing is the appellant or petitioner; the other party is appellee or respondent.
sentences.cn: 上诉的一方称为上诉人, 另一方为被上诉人.

sentences.en: The petitioner in Bishop had been fired from his job as a city policeman.
sentences.cn: "波普"案的上诉人从其市府警察的工作上被解雇.

sentences.en: Throughout this time period , the document destruction continued, despite reservations by some of petitioner � � s managers.
sentences.cn: 贯穿这段时期, 尽管一些上诉人的管理人员有所保留,销毁文件的行动一直在持续.

sentences.en: We are returning your case to USCIS to make a final determination with regards to your petitioner's ability to file a petition on your behalf.
sentences.cn: 你的申请档案正被退回美国移民局以就你的美国申请人能否为你提交移民申请做出最终的决定。

words.tran_cn: 请愿的，为请愿的；请求的
请愿；请愿书；祈求；[法] 诉状

trans.tran_cn: 请求人，请愿人，<英>离婚案原告
trans.tran_en: A petitioner is a person who presents or signs a petition
